articles.author: Lauren Milici
articles.title: Fallout TV show didn't need to use CGI to create the Wasteland because it found the perfect real-life location - Gamesradar
articles.description: Anyone fancy a trip to the Namib desert?
articles.content:
Prime Video's live-action TV adaptation of Fallout is visually stunning – and those wild desert sets are real.
Rather than throw some sand under a green screen, The Wasteland was shot in Namibia on … [+1444 chars]
